title: LeBron James, Antonio Brown, Kyler Murray, and where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: LeBron James, Antonio Brown, Kyler Murray, and where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin discusses the failure of Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James as a leader, Pittsburgh Steelers WR Antonio Brown not getting it, the latest rumors surrounding QB Kyler Murray, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Chris Broussard, Stephen Jackson, Joel Klatt, and DeAngelo Hall.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
